QuestData.Title: You Otter Know
QuestData.Description: You know what happened to the bait in those pots?$B$BOtters. That's what happened.$B$BThey prefer fresh clams, but they'll pick our crab traps clean if they're hungry enough.$B$BThe otters in Lonesome Cove are protected by law and we run a legitimate operation here. As much as I'd love to chum those little rats and call it a day, we just make sure they aren't hungry enough to raid the crab pots.$B$BToss 'em a few clams to keep them busy while you're out there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Bag of Clams to feed 8 Coldwhisker Otters in Lonesome Cove.
QuestData.CompletionText: In the words of my old deck boss: "Do what I say, 'cause I said it!"
QuestData.RewardText: That should keep their little whiskers out of our traps for awhile.
